articles.content: The final buzzer has sounded on HBO's "Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty," showing Earvin  "Magic" Johnson (Quincy Isaiah) heroically carrying the "Showtime"-era Lakers to the 1980 NBA cha… [+6015 chars]
